home.title: Hello there, I'm Omar.
home.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
home.description: I create dynamic and scalable web applications for your business, providing end-to-end solutions from concept to deployment.

about.heading: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm Omar, a Full Stack Developer based in Germany with a passion for crafting clean, efficient, and scalable web applications. I specialize in building modern digital experiences using React, Node.js, and TypeScript — tools that allow me to turn ideas into reliable and elegant solutions.
about.paragraph2: Beyond writing code, I focus on building software that’s intuitive, accessible, and maintainable. I enjoy solving real-world problems, whether it’s designing responsive UIs or developing robust APIs.
about.paragraph3: With a strong eye for detail and a love for continuous learning, I aim to write code that’s not only functional, but thoughtful — supporting long-term growth and a smooth developer experience.

web.title: Web Development
web.desc: Building responsive, accessible, and high-performance websites.
